cesm-deps.overview: CESM-DEPS is a set of dependencies and tools for supporting the Community Earth System Model (CESM) software. It includes various libraries, compilers, and software packages necessary for running CESM simulations.
core_features: Provides essential dependencies and tools for CESM software
Includes libraries, compilers, and other software required for CESM simulations
Ensures smooth operation and performance optimization of CESM models
